# SeffCovar

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of SeffCovar is to construct covariates for slide-effect-adjustment for epigenome-wide association studies.

## Installation

You can install SeffCovar using:

``` r
library(devtools)

install_github("julianhecker/SeffCovar")
```

## Example


```{r example}
library(SeffCovar)

length(S_80_100)
```
